Name: Advanced Fertilizer
Description: A culinary byproduct primarily repurposed into essential gardening goods—

Description2$english: A concentrated essence of nature's bounty, perfect for nurturing growth.

NeedMaterial.Name: Overcooked Bone Meal
NeedMaterial.Description: A culinary byproduct primarily repurposed as garden fertilizer.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A culinary byproduct primarily repurposed as garden fertilizer.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: It is made by boiling wild animal horns, drying them, and grinding them into a nutrient-rich powder—ideal for nourishing flowers and plants. However, slight overprocessing has led to excessive nutrient loss.

recipes.Name: Overcooked Bone Meal

NeedMaterial.Name: Horn

NeedMaterial.Name: Hay
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.

NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Abundantly found in nature, wild grass is a widely utilized raw material known for its usefulness and accessibility.
